archimate:BusinessProcess.name: HR Policies & Practices
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Support people management throughout the enterprise.

properties.value: HR Policies & Practices include the processes that support people management throughout the enterprise, e.g., performance appraisal, remuneration policies, remuneration levels, allowances, benefits, occupational health and safety, equal employment opportunity, compensation guidelines, code of conduct, hiring and termination guidelines, employee satisfaction measurement and management, etc.
